alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:27PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM PDT... At 425 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Three Rivers, or just west of Lodgepole in Sequoia National Park. The movement of the storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dorst Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Sequoia NP
